headline: Power Distribution Unit Industry Report 2026-2035: A $7.11 Billion Market by 2030 with Schneider Electric, Eaton, ABB, Legrand, Tripp Lite, Vertiv, and Siemens Leading
summary: Key opportunities in the power distribution unit market include rising demand for intelligent PDUs, integration with IoT for scalability and energy efficiency, and expanding edge computing. Growth is driven by investment in hyperscale and AI-driven data centers, especially in Asia-Pacific.
